name: webspark-httpclientutility-web
description: Demo application for WebSpark.HttpClientUtility - Modern NPM build pipeline

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint && vite build
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run test && vite build
scripts.clean: node -e "try { require('fs').rmSync('wwwroot/dist', { recursive: true, force: true, maxRetries: 3, retryDelay: 100 }); } catch (e) { if (e.code !== 'ENOENT') console.warn('Clean warning:', e.message); }"
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:js:fix && npm run lint:css:fix

author: WebSpark
